import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Form, Button, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import { savePaymentMethod } from '../actions/cartAction' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const PaymentScreen = ({ history }) => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart) const { shippingAddress } = cart if (!shippingAddress) { history.push('/shipping') } const [paymentMethod, setPaymentMethod] = useState('微信') const dispatch = useDispatch() const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(savePaymentMethod(paymentMethod)) navigate('/placeorder') } return (

支付方式

选择支付方式 setPaymentMethod(e.target.value)} > { setPaymentMethod(e.target.value)} > }
) } export default PaymentScreen
